channel.title: Need Help with Opening/Running Server!
channel.description:
Well, i've been working with my server for a few days, and wanna have some of my friends test it out. Yes, i know how to compile/run the server, and how to open moparscape :D. I've also made a no-ip ID. ok, so i log into MoparScape as Twisted Fun with my own pass, and make the IP "localhost". the actual IP is "abc123scape1.no-ip.org", but "localhost" should work too.
so i log in, tell my friend to login with any username, any pass, and "abc123scape1.no-ip.org" as the IP. and it didn't work. i probably missed somethin somewhere, cause i cant get it to work with other computers!
anybody, help plz!
thanks! twisted fun

item.title: Need Help with Opening/Running Server!
item.dc:creator: @Twisted_Fun Twisted Fun
item.description:
@Twisted_Fun wrote:

Well, i’ve been working with my server for a few days, and wanna have some of my friends test it out. Yes, i know how to compile/run the server, and how to open moparscape :D. I’ve also made a no-ip ID. ok, so i log into MoparScape as Twisted Fun with my own pass, and make the IP “localhost”. the actual IP is “abc123scape1.no-ip.org”, but “localhost” should work too.

so i log in, tell my friend to login with any username, any pass, and “abc123scape1.no-ip.org” as the IP. and it didn’t work. i probably missed somethin somewhere, cause i cant get it to work with other computers!

anybody, help plz!

thanks!
twisted fun
